channel.title: array on Shubham Chadokar
channel.description: Recent content in array on Shubham Chadokar

item.title: Remove an Element From an Array Using Filter in Nodejs
item.description: In nodejs, there are many options to remove an element from an array, one of them is using the filter. filter method on array returns a new array based on the filtering condition. For ex. return the even values in the array 1const arr1 = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]; 2 3const arr2 = arr1.filter((n) => n % 2 === 0); 4 5console.log(arr2); Output [2, 4, 6] Remove an element from the array Remove 5 from the array.
